title: BMW Founded
desc: BMW was founded in Munich, Germany and it initially manufactured aircraft engines during WWI.

title: BMW 303 & Kidney Grille
desc: BMW debuts in iconic kidney grille design by introduction of 303, first straight six engine.

title: BMW 2002
desc: The BMW's 2002 created the modern sport sedan segment. It has compact design with performance.

title: First 3 Series
desc: The BMW 3 Series was launched as replacement for 2002 Series. It also become BMW's most successful model.

title: BMW X5 SUV
desc: BMW's enters into the SUV market with the X5. This created the Sports Activity Vehicle (SAV) category.

title: BMW ActiveHybrid Concept
desc: BMW showcases hybrid technology and research toward electrified drivetrains and efficiency improvements.

title: i3 Urban Electric Car
desc: BMW launches the i3, It is a compact, purpose-built EV focused on urban mobility and sustainability.

title: BMW Vision M Next
desc: BMW releases plug-in hybrid performance concepts that blend EV with high performance driving dynamics.
